project.title: KPMG Law
project.intro: KPMG Law (previously Klaw) website built with Umbraco CMS.
chall: Use Uskinned theme and improve it
Meta tags adjustments for social sharing

relatedLinks.title: KPMG Careers
relatedLinks.intro: KPMG Belgium recruitment website built with Umbraco CMS.
chall: Create a custom Google maps toolkit
Implement an Instagram feed with Curator.io

relatedLinks.title: Omega
relatedLinks.intro: Omega zoo booking website with React. Information about the park and its animals as well as ability to book your stay, table or entrance via ticketing system.
chall: Integration and front-end development from Figma designs to React and CSS-in-JS coding
Use Styled-system and Emotion for styling
Complex components in the likes of a Swiper, a Carousel, Deep navigation bar and Filtering
Used recent CSS features in the names of Image clip-path and CSS grids
